rules_text:
When Boarkin Incenser enters, create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{2}, Sacrifice an artifact or another creature: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
notes:
Changed name, added art, added flavor text
2, Sacrifice a Food —> 2, Sacrifice an artifact or another creature
+ Activate only as a sorcery
